Station Update - Sydenham

A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. 
While the concourse is being installed, please use the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. 
If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

Station Update - Central

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6063489

Hawkesbury Rd bus stop closures and diversions

From 8pm Friday 5 June, Hawkesbury Rd, Westmead will be one-way in a southbound direction between Darcy Rd and Hainsworth St. The following stops will be permanently closed:

∙ The Westmead Institute Hawkesbury Rd (214516)
∙ Westmead Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214517)

The alternative stops are Westmead Children's Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214515) or Darcy Rd after Hawkesbury Rd (214518).

Overnight light rail services suspended between Central and The Star

As a result of the latest directives from the Australian Government around public gatherings, the L1 Dulwich Hill Line overnight light rail services between Central Grand Concourse and The Star are suspended from 11pm (midnight on Friday) to 6am.

These temporary service changes are in place until further notice.

Use Trip Planner for alternative transport.

Buses replace light rail services on the L1 Line

Buses replace all light rail services until further notice on the L1 Dulwich Hill Line between Central Grand Concourse and Dulwich Hill, due to light rail vehicle repairs. 

Two replacement bus routes are operating:

∙ Route 498 – limited stop service between The Star and Central Station Forecourt (adjacent to the Grand Concourse)
∙ Route 499 – Dulwich Hill to Central Station Forecourt (adjacent to the Grand Concourse) – all stops

A 50 per cent discounted fare applies on board light rail replacement bus services.

See here for further information on service frequency, recommended capacity and stop locations. 

If you are travelling between Central Station and Darling Harbour, walking might be an alternative transport option. 

L2 Randwick Line and L3 Kingsford Line will continue to run as per normal schedule. 

Allow extra travel time and use the Trip Planner or check travel alerts to see if you travel is affected, or to find alternative transport options

14:40 Brisbane to Casino service cancellation

NSW TrainLink advises that Queensland has declared most of NSW a hotspot. NSW TrainLink coach services to and from Brisbane have been cancelled. Passenger are asked to travel to / from Tweed Heads and make own arrangements to travel in Queensland.
